description: RandomizedCollection is a data structure that contains a collection of numbers, possibly duplicates (i.e., a multiset). It should support inserting and removing specific elements and also reporting a random element. Implement the RandomizedCollection class: You must implement the functions of the class such that each function works on average O(1) time complexity. Note: The test cases are generated such that getRandom will only be called if there is at least one item in the RandomizedCollection.
